<title level="1" right="Trait">[Halfling](/Traits.aspx?ID=87)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 632 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

A creature with this trait is a member of the [halfling](/Ancestries.aspx?ID=5) ancestry. These small people are friendly wanderers considered to be lucky. An ability with this trait can be used or selected only by halflings. A weapon with this trait is created and used by halflings.
name: Halfling
